snippet: A decision by the New York Court of Appeals ended one of the most unusual lawsuits resulting from Bernard L. Madoff’s Ponzi scheme, in which a man was allowed to sue his ex-wife to alter the terms of their divorce.
abstract: A decision by the New York Court of Appeals ended one of the most unusual lawsuits resulting from Bernard L. Madoff’s Ponzi scheme, in which a man was allowed to sue his ex-wife to alter the terms of their divorce.

headline.main: Court Says Madoff Victim Can't Redo Terms of His Divorce
headline.print_headline: Court Rejects a Madoff Victim’s Effort to Redo His Divorce Settlement
